hero_desc: A creative studio pushing the boundaries of immersive storytelling and game design.
about_point1: We create meaningful and immersive games.
about_point2: Our focus is on strong narrative and unique gameplay.
about_point3: We collaborate with talented partners worldwide.
project_point1: A narrative road trip in 3D isometric and point & click for PC.
project_point2: In a postwar world, you will embody a young girl with albinism.
project_point3: Travel by foot or truck through a devastated No Man’s Land.
project_point4: Face your stigmas and manage your resources to survive.
playtest_desc: Sign up to playtest Blind Frontiers. We would love to hear from you!
